desc: The Pillow Collection produces thousands of throw pillows in Fall River, Massachusetts USA from designer fabrics in square and lumbar sizes ranging from 18" x 18" square to pillow sham sizes and lumbar pillows as large as 14" x 48". All American made throw pillows ship within days and are made to order just for you!

layout.text:
FLUFF UP YOUR DECOR
WITH NEW PILLOWS
What Do Your Pillows Say About You?
